detailsSection:
KB2654644 includes the latest Embedded USB boot drivers. Binaries included are:

usb.inf
  • usb.inf
  • usbccgp.sys
  • usbhub.sys


usbport.inf
  • usbd.sys
  • usbehci.sys
  • usbhub.sys
  • usbohci.sys
  • usbport.inf
  • usbport.sys
  • usbuhci.sys


usbstor.inf
  • usbstor.sys


Windows KB2533552 is a pre-requisite for this KB. This KB solution is comprised of the following KB update package KB2529073.

This package is only applicable to systems that are using the Embedded USB boot binaries. i.e. when Embedded package WinEmb-USBBOOT is present. Images that are using the Standard USB stack(WinEmb-USB) should install the Windows KB package mentioned above (KB2529073) instead.

Installation using DISM is not a supported scenario for this update. If DISM install has to be used, installer should manually make sure the above criteria is met, i.e. Embedded USB boot(WinEmb-USBBOOT) is present.
installInstructionSection:
This update must be installed on a POSReady7 image as follows:

Executing the appropriate msu file

  • 32bit Windows6.1-KB2654644-v2-x86.msu
  • 64bit Windows6.1-KB2654644-v2-x64.msu
